title: Login issue
description: Customer is unable to log in using valid credentials.

title: Payment not processed
description: Payment was deducted but order status shows pending.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer did not receive password reset email after multiple attempts.

title: Account suspended without notice
description: Customer reports account suspension without prior warning.

title: Unable to upload documents
description: File upload fails with a timeout error.

title: Incorrect invoice generated
description: Invoice amount does not match the selected plan.

title: Slow application performance
description: Application is very slow during peak hours.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requests a dark mode option for the dashboard.

title: Email notifications not working
description: Customer is not receiving email notifications for updates.

title: Data export failure
description: Exporting data to CSV results in an empty file.
